cluster_relations.rel_desc: The butterfly life cycle includes the adult butterfly stage as the final stage.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that a life cycle or process includes a specific stage as one of its constituent phases.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The underside of leaves is a specific surface region of leaves.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is a physical part, region, or component of the object.

qualifiers.SpatialQualifier: on the lower surface of the leaf

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The butterfly life cycle includes the pupal (chrysalis) stage.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that a life cycle concept encompasses a specific developmental stage as one of its component phases.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The butterfly life cycle is one of the intricate processes that make up the natural world.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Subject is a constituent element, process, or component within the broader system or whole denoted by the object.

qualifiers.SpatialQualifier: within ecosystems of the natural world
qualifiers.OtherQualifier: EducationalContext: understanding this life cycle deepens appreciation of the natural world

remarks: Relation used to encode that the life cycle is considered one of the natural world's processes.
Relation used to encode that the life cycle is considered one of the natural world's processes.

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that a life cycle or process includes a specific stage as one of its constituent phases.
args.justification: RelR_c460038e6b2b expresses the same life-cycle-stage inclusion semantics as RelR_8be4d555e098 but currently uses a different canonical_rel_name ('includes_life_stage'). Normalizing to a single predicate 'has_stage' with a shared description improves schema consistency and reuse for all life cycle stage relations.

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is a constituent element, region, component, or process within the broader whole denoted by the object.
args.justification: Both relations encode a generic part–whole relationship, but currently use slightly divergent rel_cls values and canonical descriptions (one emphasizing physical parts and the other ecological processes). Unifying them under rel_cls 'part_whole_relation' and a generalized canonical_rel_desc that covers physical parts, regions, components, and processes yields a cleaner, reusable part-of predicate across domains while keeping the same broad COMPOSITION group.

executed_decisions.justification: Both relations encode a generic part–whole relationship, but currently use slightly divergent rel_cls values and canonical descriptions (one emphasizing physical parts and the other ecological processes). Unifying them under rel_cls 'part_whole_relation' and a generalized canonical_rel_desc that covers physical parts, regions, components, and processes yields a cleaner, reusable part-of predicate across domains while keeping the same broad COMPOSITION group.
